1. Mayor & City Council

Mayor & City Council

Learn how Snyder’s elected officials represent and serve our community. The Mayor and City Council make important decisions that guide city policy, budget, services, and development.

Use the City Council District Map to find your district and learn which council member represents you.

The City Council meets on the first Monday of every month at 5:30 pm in the City Hall Council Chambers. If a holiday falls on that date, the meeting will take place on the second Monday of the month at 5:30 pm.

Note: District Two is currently vacant.
